content: When Revenant Charbones explode, it's not just you that they damage - other enemies will be affected as well. Whenever you see them, focus on attacking one and luring it closer to other enemies, to take advantage of their explosive abilities. When they're in groups, and each one has a low health bar, this can sometimes cause a chain of explosions as they knock each other out one by one.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Camp of Seasons' and the sub-subsection 'Tip!'.
The content is as follows:
When Revenant Charbones explode, it's not just you that they damage - other enemies will be affected as well. Whenever you see them, focus on attacking one and luring it closer to other enemies, to take advantage of their explosive abilities. When they're in groups, and each one has a low health bar, this can sometimes cause a chain of explosions as they knock each other out one by one.
